From: support@prolexic.com
To: potto@foo.com
Subject: 06-04-2015-AKAMAI TECHNOLOGIES FRA2 PLANNED MAINTENANCE NOTIFICATION  CONTINUED

Subject - AKAMAI TECHNOLOGIES: [ FRA2 ] PLANNED MAINTENANCE NOTIFICATION  CONTINUED

Location(s): Frankfurt, DE (FRA2)

Date: June 4th, 2015 22:00- June 5th,2015 02:00 UTC

Duration: 6 hours

Priority: Normal

Reason: Expansion of scrubbing center

Akamai Technologies will be finalizing an essential maintenance between Thursday night 22:00 UTC and 02:00 UTC on Friday morning June 5th 2015.

During the event window Akamai will be turning-up additional routers and begin advertising traffic in the Frankfurt scrubbing center in order to provide redundancy, added capacity and improve resilience.

The maintenance work planned should not affect any services running from the Frankfurt scrubbing center. Our mitigation capabilities will not be affected and traffic will not be routed off during the maintenance.

Please do not hesitate to contact the Akamai Security Operations Center  should you have any questions or concerns.

Thank you,

Alvaro Cordero

Practice Manager 

Global Security Operations Akamai Technologies
